question: India announced to support the candidature of Abdullah Shahid, the Foreign Minister of which country, for the UNGA Presidency in 2021?
explanation:
India and Maldives have recently signed two MoUs for High-impact community development projects, MoU on cooperation in sports and youth affairs and another MoU for the USD 100 million grant for the Greater Male Connectivity Project (GMCP).
India also affirmed its support for Maldive’s Foreign Minister Shahid’s candidature for the Presidency of the 76th session of the UN General Assembly in 2021.
